arts.ttl: Marius Müller garners praise from Wolfsburg coach Hasenhüttl
arts.sum: Ralph Hasenhüttl made some positive remarks about Marius Müller, following his excellent performance in the 2-1 victory in Bremen on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Mitchell Weiser addressed team morale after latest Werder Bremen loss: “We don’t have an ego problem.”
arts.sum: As SV Werder Bremen continue to sink into crisis, team leader Mitchell Weiser still wished to emphasize a few positives after the latest loss.

arts.ttl: Hasenhüttl full of praise for Wimmer after brace: "He has a great future"
arts.sum: Ralph Hasenhüttl heaped praise on Patrick Wimmer after the Austria international scored a brace against Werder Bremen.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg secure victory against persistent Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Patrick Wimmer's brace a fantastic goalkeeping performance from Marius Müller helped Wolfsburg secure a narrow 2-1 victory over Werder Bremen at the Weserstadion. Patrick Wimmer celebrates his stunning second goal, leaving Bremen players dejected in the background - IMAGO/Darius Simka

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen prepared to pay €50m for Wolfsburg’s Mohamed Amoura
arts.sum: The local Wolfsburger Allgemeine Zeitung reports that Bayer 04 Leverkusen are interested in acquiring Algerian striker Mohammed Amoura from Germany's green company team.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg surprise sensation Marius Müller on the hunt for Europe: “We need to have the balls.”
arts.sum: Thriving VfL Wolfsburg keeper Marius Müller had some interesting words when commenting on the state of his team in an interview with Kicker.

arts.ttl: Lukas Nmecha likely to leave Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Lukas Nmecha has been plagued with injuries since August 2023, missing 43 games across all competitions for Wolfsburg and with an expiring contract, the 26-year-old forward is unlikely to be…

arts.ttl: Oliver Burke could potentially lead Werder Bremen attack this weekend
arts.sum: SV Werder Bremen head coach Ole Werner dropped strong hints that he might be turning to Scottish striker Oliver Burke this weekend.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Wolfsburg preview: Looking ahead to the W Derby
arts.sum: Two Bundesliga sides that many neutrals confuse with one another face off on Saturday at the Weserstadion.
